entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
